author: danhaywood
msg: minor tidy up of site apt for progmodels:wrapper and progmodels:groovy

author: marvin
msg: The "dist" target which builds our CPAN distro had to be adapted for recent
developments, such as the addition of LICENSE and NOTICE files and the porting
of the Clownfish compiler to C.

author: marvin
msg: Building the Clownfish compiler is a prerequisite for generating POD files
needed by the "dist" action which builds the CPAN distro for Lucy, but it
leaves a lot of detritus lying around.  This commit edits MANIFEST.SKIP so
that the generated files are not included in the Lucy CPAN tarball.

author: nzhang
msg: HIVE-2142. Jobs do not get killed even when they created too many files. (He Yongqiang via Ning Zhang)

author: ryan
msg: SOLR-2485: deprecate BaseResponseWriter, GenericBinaryResponseWriter, and GenericTextResponseWriter
